	#### Smallarms Factory ###
	smallarms_factory = {
		smallarmsfactory1 = {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				infantry_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				garrison_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				HQ_equipment = {

	#### Truck Factory ###
	truck_factory = {
		truckfactory1 = {

			allowed = {
				always = no
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				motorized_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				motorized_AC_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				motorized_lia_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				#motorized_HT_equipment = {
				#	build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				#}
				mechanized_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				artytruck_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				artytractor_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				motorized_rocket_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				recon_mot_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				reconac_equipment  = {

	#### Artillery Factory
	artillery_factory = {
		artilleryfactory1= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				anti_air_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				HVanti_air_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				anti_tank_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				HVanti_tank_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				artillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				mountain_artillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				medartillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				Hvartillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				superartillery_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				rocket_artillery_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				infantrygun_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				mortar_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				railartillery_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
			}
		}
		artilleryfactory2= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				anti_air_equipment = {

		##### SOV - Light Aircraft Factory #########

	### Heavy Aircraft Factory ###
	Hvaircraft_factory = {

		GER_hvaircraftfactory1 = {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				he_45_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				ju_52_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				do_17_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				ju_88_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				ar_234_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				do_23_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				he_111_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				do_217_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				do_217_k_bomber_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes

					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}

					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
